scripts.build: npm run lint:fix && npm run lint && npm test && npm run build:clean && npm run compile && echo 'ðŸ“¦ Build artifact has been generated successfully.'
scripts.build:clean: rimraf -fr dist/ && echo 'ðŸ§¹ Build artifacts has been cleaned.'
scripts.docs:gen: npm run docs:clean && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jsdoc -c jsdoc.json && echo 'ðŸ“„ Docs has been generated successfully.'
scripts.docs:clean: rimraf -fr ./docs && echo 'ðŸ§¹ All docs has been cleaned.'

hooks.pre-commit: npm run commitlint ${1} && npm run lint:fix && npm run lint && npm test
